front.title: Dynamic Placement of Pseudowires using a Path Computation Element

abstract.t: When dynamically established Pseudowires (PW) span across multiple service providers networks, or across multiple autonomous systems, there is a need to calculate the best route among a set of switching point PEs (S- PE). A method for calculating said "best route", and choosing the S-PEs is described in this document using the existing Path Computation Element work done in the PCE WG.
